text: Sulemana je kahi icchita asata te (jinnata) tayara karuna deta, jase killa, citra (smaraka), talavasarakhya parati ani culinvara kayama tikuna rahanarya dega (mothe mothe patele) he da'udacya vansajanno! Tyacyasi krtajnata vyakta karanyakarita satkarme kara, majhya dasampaiki krtajnasila dasa phara kamica asatata
